name: py-oslo-config

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
The Oslo configuration API supports parsing command line arguments and
.ini style configuration files.

dependencies.name: py-debtcollector
dependencies.description:
A collection of Python deprecation patterns and strategies that help
you collect your technical debt in a non-destructive manner.

dependencies.name: py-netaddr
dependencies.description: A system-independent network address manipulation library for Python

dependencies.name: py-oslo-i18n
dependencies.description:
The oslo.i18n library contain utilities for working with
internationalization (i18n) features, especially translation for text
strings in an application or library.

dependencies.name: py-pbr
dependencies.description:
PBR is a library that injects some useful and sensible default behaviors
into your setuptools run.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-rfc3986
dependencies.description:
A Python implementation of RFC 3986 including validation and authority
parsing.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-stevedore
dependencies.description: Manage Dynamic Plugins for Python Applications.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-python-keystoneclient
dependent_to.description:
This is a client for the OpenStack Identity API, implemented by the
Keystone team
